trans-unit.target:
Enter the time in minutes, how many cache requests should be saved on the server. When a request is made, the script will check when the cache file was created and if it exceeds the specified limit, the cache will be recreated.
Default: 60 minutes
If enabled, it will create text logs in engine/inc/maharder/_logs.
Save the logs in a database?
All - Sends literally all reports and logs to the channel
Errors - Sends only errors to channel
Information - Sends only informational reports to the channel
Notifications - Sends only notifications to the channel
Warnings - Sends only warnings to the channel
Critical errors - Sends only critical errors to the channel
Debugging - Sends only debugging information to channel

If logging is not set in the plugin, then messages of this kind will not be sent either.
If "All" is selected, the other selected parameters are ignored.
When enabled, the old icons will be replaced by updated icons in the DLE admin panel
Add a button with cache clearing?
You can choose between light (standard) and dark for now. Save and refresh the page
The name of the template cannot be empty

Download the file: ${file}!
The result is in the browser console!

The data has been saved!

Page is about to refresh!
[NEW] Added support for Doctrine MhDB. Further models for the database will work through this system.
[NEW] Added multi-language support, translation can be done using Crowdin service. Link in the footer of each module.
[NEW] Added ability to output logs on a separate page.
[UPDATE] The installer has been simplified. Dependencies are now loaded and installed the first time you open [any] module. May take a few minutes. The installer now weighs very little.
[UPDATE] Rollback functions that used the DLEFiles class. It does not work with third-party developments as it should. Or it works, but there is no documentation for it.
[UPDATE] It was decided to use standard DLE classes to work with files
[NEW] Added functionality to check for plugin updates
[UPDATE] Changed the approach to some classes
[FIX] I got back needed but deleted files
[NEW] Added function to send logs to telegram [BETA]
[NEW] Added ability for user to decide whether to use updated icons in admin panel or not
[NEW] Added the ability for the user to decide whether or not to enable the global cache clearing button in the admin area
[NEW] Further work with the database will be done only through the models I created. The functionality of Model and Table classes will be used for this purpose
[UPDATE] Logging errors will be logged further via Monolog - Logging for PHP. When enabled - the library will send notifications to the browser console, as well as save files to the logs folder.
[UPDATE] Update libraries to the latest versions with the lowest possible PHP version 7.2.9
[UPDATE] FontAwesome 6.1.1 Pro icons are connected, light variant is used (please report missing or missing icons).
[FIX] Documented the classes with small explanations of what a function does and what a variable is used for
Due to some circumstances i18n module had to be discontinued. Perhaps it will be released as a separate module.
Updating dependencies to the minimum required PHP 7.4 version
For those wishing to create a module based on my admin, a function to generate paths and files has been created
Fontawesome have been updated to version 6
File integrity check and updates have been added
A completely new admin panel that is independent of the design and functionality of DLE itself
Twig engine was taken as a basis for the panel, it will be easier to create your own templates
Clearing the cache in the admin panel has become easier - the button has been moved in line with "Add news" and "Edit news"
i18n has been implemented in the DLE system, which allows for the creation of multilingual websites (the module will not be sold or made separately).
i18n: database-independent, all phrases are stored in json files
i18n: in templates it is enough to use the {trans text="here translatable text"} tag to translate the phrase
i18n: In PHP scripts, it is sufficient to use the function translate("here is the text to be translated"), to translate the phrase

i18n: In JS scripts, it is sufficient to use the function translateJS("here is the text to be translated"), to translate the phrase. It is recommended to load phrases when the page is loaded, since async is not fully implemented.

i18n: multilingualism is supported in "News", "Banners", "Categories", "Email / Newsletters", "Meta tags", "Polls", "Questions and answers", "Static pages", "User groups", as well as the output of news and static pages on the site.
i18n: machine translation via RapidApi service is supported
i18n: dynamic usage that does not require massive amounts of data - just specify text
small fix in the language file
Adding language files (in the future it will be easier to localize modules)
Added German language to the UI
Automatic output of additional fields in the admin area
The required data was not filled in
[NEW] Database table modeling has been added using Cycle ORM. This will help further in creating modules with a more complex structure and working with data.
[NEW] All changes to the tables will be stored in a separate table "migrations" and in the "_migrations" folder. This will make it easy to roll back changes.
[NEW] The ability to sort and filter table data has been added on the administrative panel pages (where available, e.g., Logs).
[NEW] The ability to check for plugin updates on the website devcraft.club has been added. A guest key is used.
[UPDATE] The installer has been simplified. Dependencies are now loaded and installed the first time you open [any] module. May take a few minutes. The installer now weighs very little.
[UPDATE] The admin panel file structure has been changed. Now all module files are located in the "_modules" folder, and templates in the "_templates" folder.
[DELETE] Deprecated and unnecessary logging methods have been removed.
[DELETE] Icon replacement in the DLE admin panel has been removed.
Enter the module name; the script will create all paths and files and set the necessary access rights automatically.
Enter the module name in Latin; otherwise, the standard DLE function for converting the name will be used.

Icon class. FontAwesome PRO is connected to the site.
Default: (fad fa-cogs)
Specify the full path to the plugin icon starting from your site's root. For example, engine/skins/images/my_icon.png

Specify the URL name of your project on CrowdIn. Example: From https://crowdin.com/project/mhadmin/ take mhadmin.

Default: Name in Latin letters

trans-unit.target: Specify the Translation Statistics ID on CrowdIn from the Badges & Status Images add-on;
Enter the module's link on the author's website (technical support, GitHub, etc.)
Enter the module documentation link on the author's website (technical support, GitHub, etc.)
The script will create an initial plugin and add it to the database

The script will overwrite existing files with templates.
At your own risk!

Download the file: :file:!
The result is in the browser console!
[FIX] Fixed cyclic dependency issue in the translations class
[FIX] For an unknown reason, the old version was merged over the new one
[FIX] Fixed minor bugs in the code
[FIX] Added placeholders for styles and scripts
Failed to save the update lock file: {{path}}
Failed to set write permissions for the update lock file: {{path}}
Failed to update the contents of the update lock file: {{path}}
Authorized user has no right for this operation!
[FIX] Fixing paths and cache checks for the ComposerAction class
[NEW] Added method for saving plugin configuration, <kbd>saveConfig</kbd> in the class <kbd>DataManager</kbd>
[FIX] The function <kbd>joinPaths</kbd> has been fixed for correct path processing, especially in Windows environments
[FIX] Fixed problems with variables when generating new modules.
[FIX] Caching system issues have been resolved.
[NEW] New type in input.twig: date, time and datetime
[NEW] Adding new filters (rangeFilter and dateRangeFilter) for TwigFilter
[NEW] Added function `getFullUserGroups()` in the trait `DleData` for displaying information about all groups
[NEW] The `userGroup()` function has been added for outputting a specific group of users in Twig templates
[NEW] Added `current_user` variable to output an array of information about the current user and `userInfo()` function to output a specific user in Twig templates.
[NEW] The fields "Who created" and "Who modified" have been added to the base model (BasisModel). The data can be viewed in the database itself, or in the view of the entity itself.
[UPDATE] The editor for large fields, where the editor is connected, has been updated. TinyMCE with configuration from DLE is used. No file uploads yet.
[UPDATE] Documentation for the methods getGlobals and getFunctions in AdminUrlExtension has been updated
[UPDATE] A new method createOrUpdate has been added for the MhDB class
